channel.title: How do i change the max levels?
channel.description:
how can i change change the max levels from 99 to 200 or 125? is there anyone who knows it?
thanks for reading
p0wn3d

item.title: How do i change the max levels?
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

} else if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) >= 96 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) <= 99) {
im not sure, this is maybe an example?
try like doing it for example its prayer, like that:
} else if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) >= 99 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) <= 102) {

playerLevel[0] = Attack
playerLevel[1] = Defence
playerLevel[2] = Strength
playerLevel[3] = Hitpoints
playerLevel[4] = Range
playerLevel[5] = Prayer
playerLevel[6] = Magic
playerLevel[7] = Cooking
playerLevel[8] = WoodCutting
playerLevel[9] = Fletching
playerLevel[10] = Fishing
playerLevel[11] = Firemaking
playerLevel[12] = Crafting
playerLevel[13] = Smithing
playerLevel[14] = Mining
playerLevel[15] = Herblore
playerLevel[16] = Agility
playerLevel[17] = Thieving
playerLevel[18] = Slayer
playerLevel[19] = Farming
playerLevel[20] = Runecrafting

hope i helped

item.title: How do i change the max levels?
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

staticfish1:

I think its in client.java search for >99. I dont remember I did this a while ago

yes it is then you need to change the return values for the max lvl u want and change the max exp for the corresponding level then search again and there usually is another token that contains 99 with it’s max exp value again. change those for your new max lvl
